xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.KeyMap/@shift
sname
shift
sinputtype
truefalse
sdefault
false
Sdescription
#$@text#$@
<p>True to handle key only when shift is pressed, False to handle the key only when shift is not pressed (defaults to undefined)<br />
&nbsp;</p>
#$@text#$@
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
